text: MULTI - PLATINUM SELLING ARTIST CHRISTINA AGUILERA TO HONOR WHITNEY HOUSTON AND THE 25TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE FILM “ THE BODYGUARD ” WITH MUSICAL TRIBUTE AT THE “ 2017 AMERICAN MUSIC AWARDS® ” WORLD ’ S LARGEST FAN VOTED AWARDS SHOW TO CELEBRATE 45 YEARS OF GIVING FANS THE VERY BEST IN MUSIC The Live Broadcast Will Air Sunday, November 19th at 8 : 00pm ET on ABC For digital assets and nominee gif galleries, please
